channel.title: Computer Science on Jeffrey Carpenter
channel.description: Recent content in Computer Science on Jeffrey Carpenter

item.title: 100 Days of Swift: Days 4 & 5
item.description: Day 4: I didn’t post anything yesterday because it was a very simple review day. Nothing too heavy to really discuss in a blog post. I reviewed the nine topics listed on Hacking with Swift, Swift Review, Day One (variables and constants, data types, operators, string interpolation, arrays, dictionaries, conditionals, loops, and switch cases). I followed that up with a non-Swift review of methods, information hiding, and scope. I believe it is very important to not only understand Swift, but also to have an understanding of the computer science fundamentals.
